JobTitle: Staff Software Engineer - Uber for Business
JobFullDesc: Uber for Business (U4B) is a product suite that enables businesses to create a centralized account where employees can charge trips, eats, gift cards, vouchers etc directly to their employer via the uber mobile applications. The product provides complete transparency into all employee trips, allows businesses to set policies and restrictions on employee travel, and consolidates business travel management, increasing administrative efficiency. About the RoleAs a Staff Software Engineer, you will collaborate, mentor, and lead a larger team of talented engineers to drive full-stack development standards, work continually to enhance customer facing features along with scaling platform services and instill a high engineering bar on the U4B team. This is an opportunity and challenge to make an impact in the real world using exciting and new technologies. You will work with nimble, multidisciplinary teams, releasing code to end users as fast as possible. This is a rare opportunity to change the world such that everyone around you is using the product you built. We’re not just another social web app, we’re moving real people (people indeed need more help on Uber Health side) and assets and reinventing transportation and logistics globally.What You’ll DoProvide technical leadership in designing, implementing, testing and rolling out the next generations of the flagship U4B systems.
